subtitle: This vegetable side dish can be served with most meat dishes and is especially good with roasts.

method.text: Place the prepared green beans in a pan of boiling water. Boil for 4-5 min until tender. Drain well.
Melt the butter in a large saucepan. Add the drained green beans and haricot beans with the parsley. Heat through for 3-5 min until hot.

title: Mixed bean duo
